Ayesha Khan.description: waking up and completing her morning routine (conversing about Wolfgang Schulz and Ayesha Khan are discussing ways to incorporate segments on the historical impact of systemic racism, inviting local activists and historians, showcasing personal narratives and spoken word performances, hosting a workshop on allyship and privilege, collaborating with Black-owned businesses and artists, and creating a mentorship program for young Black leaders to ensure full representation and inclusivity at their event.) @ the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:common room:common room table
